Source Unknown Faux-Leather Bomber Jacket

With cargo pockets and a popped collar, this is the style that will bring in the most compliments on cool spring days.

Lioness Kenny Bomber Tan

There aren’t too many things chicer than patina leather. This one offers that lived-in vintage look at a fraction of the cost.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Zara Faux Leather Bomber Jacket

Get into the color of the year with this chocolate mousse faux leather bomber that features a silver zip, asymmetric pockets, and a ruched waistband.

Saint Laurent Bomber Jacket

When it comes to cool leather jackets, count Saint Laurent’s expertly crafted styles as the cream of the crop. You’ll be wearing this drop-shoulder style for years and years to come.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Mango Leather Bomber

If you’re looking for a deeper hue, this deep brown tone is the way to go. Move quickly; this beloved style is already selling out.

Agolde x Shoreditch Ski Club Tate Faux Leather Bomber Jacket

In coveted collaborations, Agolde and Shoreditch Skic Club created a lust-worthy bomber that will keep you warm on chilly spring mornings and nights.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

H&M Oversized Leather Jacket

Again, the popped collar is a key trend this season, too. So check two boxes with this sleek silhouette.

Alo Premier Faux Leather Bomber Jacket

Fans of the puffer bomber will appreciate Alo’s ready-to-wear design that comes with sharp lapels and a semi-hidden zipper.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Aritzia Josephine Bomber

Need extra pockets? Consider Aritzia’s cool-girl take on the leather bomber jacket trend.

GRLFRND Cropped Leather Bomber Jacket

A cropped silhouette with oversized sleeves strikes the perfect balance in this black leather bomber jacket. Wear it with your high-waisted jeans or a pair of shorts this spring.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Róhe Róhe Leather Bomber Jacket

Here’s proof that, sometimes, bigger is better. Picture this oversized one paired with your favorite leggings or pleated trousers.

AnOnlyChild Sanguinetti Jacket

The leather bomber has never looked chicer, thanks to AnOnlyChild’s brilliantly draped take on the lightweight jacket.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Fforme Aram cropped leather jacket

No collar? No problem. Fforme puts a modern twist on the leather bomber with impeccable details.

Loewe Balloon Jacket

If you’re looking for beautiful craftsmanship, zoom in on Loewe’s balloon silhouette that comes with ruched sumptuous leather secured by a clever drawstring.
